alert.note: Alert for Perry (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 15 at 11:45PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Perry County through 1215 AM EDT... At 1144 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Junction City, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... New Lexington, Somerset, Shawnee, Perry State Forest, Crooksville, Junction City, New Straitsville, Corning, Hemlock and Rendville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
